comparison.description: Determines how the relative durability value of the item should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how the relative durability value of the item should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value which the durability value of the item should be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value which the durability value of the item should be compared to.

type.description:
[Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/relative_durability)

Checks the current and the percentage durability value of the item.

Type ID: `origins:relative_durability`

!!! note

    The percentage of the durability value can be calculated with the `currentDurability / maxDurability` formula.
type.markdownDescription:
[Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/relative_durability)

Checks the current and the percentage durability value of the item.

Type ID: `origins:relative_durability`

!!! note

    The percentage of the durability value can be calculated with the `currentDurability / maxDurability` formula.
